source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLALLOCATE_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_GLPRODUCT_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[Myob_Actuals]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Answers]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Audit]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Certification]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Contract]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Incident]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Operation]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Price_Point]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Questions]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Incident]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Sales_Other]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Sales_Unit]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Strategic_Project_Deliverable]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Strategic_Project]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[OPS_Timber_Sales]
  WHERE [Validation_Error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'TGR % spEst %'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];
